iati-activity.title: Concern Worldwide:Health and Nutrition Programme
iati-activity.description: This project will contribute to a sustainable reduction in maternal and child mortality in Dowa and Nkhotakota districts in particular. Concern Worldwide will extend their community-based approach to two new districts in Malawi and seek to address the barriers to accessing health care services among the rural poor. It will develop the capacity of communities and the health sector to identify, refer and care for sick and malnourished mothers and children. They will support Village Health Committees in 500 villages to develop, monitor and deliver health care within their community; develop household and community knowledge and resources; and promote behaviour to help prevent illness and ensure timely treatment. This will include the use of community volunteers, local support groups and local community radio, as well as increasing the capacity to deliver accessible community level health services.
